ports.name: Update State
ports.text: Updates the output-parameters (`Speaking`, `Pending`, `Paused`). There is no need to connect this if you donâ€™t use them.

ports.name: Text
ports.text: The text which should be said. If `Say On Text Change` is set to `true`, every time you change the text it will be said.

ports.name: Say
ports.text: Says text, the most important port of this op.

ports.name: Voice
ports.text: There are multiple voices to choose from. These may vary depending on your browser.

ports.name: Pitch
ports.text: The pitch (how high / low), in range `[0..2]`, will be actived the next time you call `Say`.

ports.name: Say on Text Change
ports.text: If set every time you change the text it will be said

ports.name: Resume
ports.text: Resumes saying things after a pause

ports.name: Cancel
ports.text: Cancels the queue, if you trigger `Say` too often, this might come in handy.

ports.name: Speaking
ports.text: `true` when the voice is currently speaking. You need to connect `Update State` for this to be updated.

ports.name: Pending
ports.text: `true` when the last say command (the last text) is waiting in line. You need to connect `Update State` to e.g. `MainLoop` for this to be updated.

ports.name: Paused
ports.text: `true` when the voice is currently paused. You need to connect `Update State` to e.g. `MainLoop` for this to be updated.
